name: Blight Of Ignorance
description:
You play as a detective - Derek Dagger, who made some poor choices along the way of his career. The struggle, which he must go through is unbearable as he is tortured with guilt about the recent accident involving a gruesome crime of a women - Madeline. What can he do to not lose his life to ignorance? 

The game was made for the "Noir November Jam" in less than 5 days. 
Feel free to post some feedback, criticism and any comments, concerning the game, it's functionality and bugs. 

Assets used in the game are just prefabs, which come with the game engine. Original score is composed by me. I've included those scores for free, you can use them in any way or form, without giving me credit.
